content.question:
A group of researchers were trying to determine how self-esteem and self-efficacy were related to the development of a healthy self-concept. Participants in the research study completed a questionnaire, and the resulting data were graphed into a scatterplot.

Self-Concept

What type of relationship does the scatterplot indicate between self-efficacy and self-esteem?

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 3.C: Interpret quantitative or qualitative inferential data from a given table, graph, chart, figure, or diagram.
